GSD.description:
iommu/arm-smmu-v3: fix event handling soft lockup

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.189 by commit ea057ac8c9427bc01271ccbb86fed69a793d3d64. For more details please see the references link.
